page.title: 12Engineering Co.(Wilminstone)
page.content: Wallabrook Engineering company supplies calor gas and installs central heating.They also look after the boilers at Dartmoor prison.Most villages in this area do not have a gas supply.Wallabrook Engineering delivers calor gas to these areas each week :Bere Alston, Calstock, Gunnislake,Mary Tavy, Peter Tavy, Lydford,Dartmoor, Yelverton and Tavistock.They store a large amount of calor gas in their grounds.This is an ideal place for safety because there are not many houses around the site They have existed for eight years, six years at Wilminstone Industrial Estate and for the last two years they have had a shop in Tavistock.They employ eight people,six men and two women.Two of these are part time workers.They live at:Horrabridge, Gunnislake,Lydford and Tavistock.
